original_text:
If the Lord had not been my help,
    my soul would soon have lived in the land of silence.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 도움이 되지 아니하셨더면 내 영혼이 벌써 침묵 속에 잠겼으리로다

sentences.original_text: If the Lord had not been my help
my soul would soon have lived in the land of silence.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 영혼은 곧 침묵의 땅에 살았을 것입니다.
